login.title: Welcome Back!
login.subtitle: Log in to access your tele-health services.
login.fillFieldsError: Please enter your email and password.
login.genericError: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
login.biometricSuccessMessage: Biometric authentication successful. Logging you in...
login.biometricErrorGeneric: Biometric authentication failed or was cancelled.
login.biometricNotAvailableMessage: Biometric authentication is not available or not set up on this device.

roomEntry.title: Join Consultation
roomEntry.subtitle: Enter the Room ID to start or join a video consultation.
roomEntry.invalidRoomId: Please enter a valid Room ID.
roomEntry.logoutConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?
roomEntry.consentRequiredMessage: To proceed, please review and accept our data processing terms.

call.title: Video Consultation
call.cameraPermissionDenied: Camera permission is required for video calls. Please enable it in settings.
call.microphonePermissionDenied: Microphone permission is required for video calls. Please enable it in settings.
call.mediaError: Could not access camera/microphone. Please check permissions.
call.setupError: Failed to set up the call. Please try again.

statusMessage.failed: Connection failed. Please check your network.

call.speakerFeatureNote: Speaker control may require InCallManager or OS-level management.
call.docShareErrorUri: Could not get a usable URI for the selected document.

security.deviceCompromised: Security Alert: Your device appears to be compromised (jailbroken/rooted). For your security, app access is restricted.
security.contactSupport: Please secure your device or contact support for assistance.

toastMessages.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
toastMessages.permissionsDenied: Some permissions were denied. Functionality may be limited.
toastMessages.consentRequired: You must accept all terms to continue.

consent.modalDescription: To use our tele-medicine services, please review and confirm the following. Your privacy and data security are important to us.
consent.cameraAccessDescription: Allow access to your camera for video consultations.
consent.microphoneAccessDescription: Allow access to your microphone for audio during consultations.
consent.dataTransmissionDescription: Your audio and video data will be transmitted securely (encrypted with SRTP/DTLS, signaling via WSS).
consent.medicalDataProcessingDescription: Processing of health-related data discussed during consultations is managed in compliance with privacy laws (e.g., KVKK Art. 5/2-c vital interest).
consent.allConsentsRequired: All consents must be given to proceed.
consent.declinedMessage: You have declined the consent. Your session will be terminated.
consent.legalReference: For more information, please review our Privacy Policy. (Ref: GDPR Art. 6(1)(a), KVKK Art. 5/1)

dashboard.noDoctors: No doctors available at the moment.

reminder.body: Your appointment with {{participantName}} is in 5 minutes.
